content: "The protesters are calling on the president to support legislation that would give people with disabilities in need of long-term care alternatives to nursing homes. " "http://www.breitbart.com/article.php?id=D97R0KEG0&show_article=1" The State Of TN has a nice program that allows the patients to live in normal houses with a around the clock nurse. But unfortunately with all G programs meant to help the ones that really need it, get taken advantage of..those are the ones that really tick me off.
